results.original_title: ニンジャバットマン対ヤクザリーグ
results.overview: The Batman family has returned to the present to discover that Japan has disappeared, and a giant island - Hinomoto - is now in the sky over Gotham City.  At the top sit the Yakuza, a group of superpowered individuals who reign without honor or humanity and look suspiciously like the Justice League. Now, it’s up to Batman and his allies to save Gotham!
results.title: Batman Ninja vs. Yakuza League

results.overview: A group of college friends rent an Airbnb for the biggest music festival of the year. But their weekend of partying quickly takes a turn, as the group is murdered one by one, in correspondence with the seven deadly sins.
results.title: #AMFAD: All My Friends Are Dead

results.overview: A university professor gradually succumbing to blindness is entranced by an obsessive love, in this modern-day adaptation of a classic Korean fairy tale.
results.title: Scarlet Innocence

results.overview: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation with his daughter's attractive friend.
results.title: American Beauty

results.overview: When Elmer Fudd brings Bugs Bunny home for dinner main course, Bugs tricks him into thinking there is a terrible outbreak of Rabbititus.
results.title: Hare Tonic

results.overview: The fastest gun in the West tries to escape his reputation.
results.title: The Gunfighter

results.overview: A cryptic message from Bond’s past sends him on a trail to uncover a sinister organization. While M battles political forces to keep the secret service alive, Bond peels back the layers of deceit to reveal the terrible truth behind SPECTRE.
results.title: Spectre

results.original_title: The Man with the Iron Fists
results.overview: In feudal China, a blacksmith who makes weapons for a small village is put in the position where he must defend himself and his fellow villagers.
results.title: The Man with the Iron Fists

results.overview: College friends find their weekend of sex and debauchery ruined when deadly zombie beavers swarm their riverside cabin.
results.title: Zombeavers

results.overview: Light years from Earth, 26 years after being abducted, Peter Quill finds himself the prime target of a manhunt after discovering an orb wanted by Ronan the Accuser.
results.title: Guardians of the Galaxy

results.overview: A boy explores the hidden depths of his bathtub in a grey world dominated by boring adults.
results.title: Benny's Bathtub

results.overview: The Maclean brothers, Paul and Norman, live a relatively idyllic life in rural Montana, spending much of their time fly fishing. The sons of a minister, the boys eventually part company when Norman moves east to attend college, leaving his rebellious brother to find trouble back home. When Norman finally returns, the siblings resume their fishing outings, and assess where they've been and where they're going.
results.title: A River Runs Through It

results.overview: “The Crocodiles” are back and they are in for quite an adventure! Frank is seriously hurt and needs a liver donation. In order to save him, the gang needs to get Frank’s brother out of prison. Their plan is risky and the stakes are high.
results.title: The Crocodiles: All for One

results.original_title: 宇宙刑事ギャバンTHE MOVIE
results.overview: Fifteen years ago, three childhood friends, Geki, Sherry and Okuma, were star-gazing and became inspired to go into space. As adults, Geki and Okuma join a mission to Mars, but their space shuttle goes missing before they could reach their destination. A year later, a monster attacks and a mysterious silver-colored warrior appears.
results.title: Space Cop Gavan The Movie

results.overview: A boy, bruised by life, finds his salvation through the love of his dogs.
results.title: Dogman

results.overview: A wave twisting tale of a soul searching surfer experiencing an existential crisis.
results.title: Surfer, Dude

results.overview: Ford, a surfing instructor from the Philippines has been told his whole life that he's the son of Francis Ford Coppola. He's wasted his youth waiting as his mother petitions the director to acknowledge Ford as his son. But as the surfing season ends, he’s forced to confront his past actions, inactions, and the stories of his life.
results.title: Apocalypse Child

results.overview: An anthology of brief comic sketches based on manias, mainly sexual, featuring several figures of Italian society.
results.title: The Maniacs

results.overview: A young confidential informant is sent on a dangerous undercover operation. It's a no-holds-barred look at the vulnerable foot soldiers of the War on Drugs, young criminals who are pressured to work for the police.
results.title: All Souls
